Package library.borrow

Class Borrow

java.lang.Object
library.borrow.Borrow
public class Borrow extends Object
Represents a borrowing record of a media item by a user. Tracks the borrow date, due date, and return status.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alaa, Jana

  • Constructor Details

    • Borrow

      public Borrow(Media media, User user)
      Creates a borrowing record for a media item and user. The borrow date is set to the current date, and the due date is calculated based on the media's borrow period.
      Parameters:
      media - the media being borrowed
      user - the user borrowing the media

  • Method Details

    • getMedia

      public Media getMedia()
      Returns:
      the borrowed media

    • getUser

      public User getUser()
      Returns:
      the user who borrowed the media

    • getBorrowDate

      public LocalDate getBorrowDate()
      Returns:
      the date when the media was borrowed

    • getDueDate

      public LocalDate getDueDate()
      Returns:
      the due date for returning the media

    • isReturned

      public boolean isReturned()
      Returns:
      true if the media has been returned, false otherwise

    • setReturned

      public void setReturned(boolean returned)
      Sets the returned status of the borrowed media.
      Parameters:
      returned - true if returned, false otherwise

    • setBorrowDate

      public void setBorrowDate(LocalDate borrowDate)
      Sets the borrow date.
      Parameters:
      borrowDate - the new borrow date

    • setDueDate

      public void setDueDate(LocalDate dueDate)
      Sets the due date.
      Parameters:
      dueDate - the new due date

    • isOverdue

      public boolean isOverdue()
      Checks if the borrowed media is overdue.
      Returns:
      true if not returned and the current date is after due date, false otherwise
